In my family, voting was a sacred responsibility, one which we never took for granted. I’m excited to be a part of @WhenWeAllVote to inspire and empower all eligible voters to make their voices heard. #WhenWeAllVote, we can make history. http://whenweallvote.org https://twitter.com/WhenWeAllVote/status/1019952118839427074 …

Thank you to the people of Tensta & Rinkeby, Sweden for welcoming me into your community. It was humbling and eye-opening to see love & light in a place considered by some to be a “No-Go Zone.” Much love to my brother @QD3 for making this experience possible. : Hugo Norbergpic.twitter.com/3hzXGKZiZZ
